titleStmt.title: Pasquils iestes mixed with Mother Bunches merriments. Whereunto is added a bakers doozen of guiles. Very prettie and pleasant, to driue away the tediousnesse of a winters evening.
titleStmt.author: Pasquil.
Fennor, William, attributed name. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Windet] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstones Church-yard, in Fleetestreete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Pasquils iests, and Mother Bunches merriments.
Identified as STC 19451a on UMI microfilm.
Title page cropped at head; several pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
